documentation.title: Manage email templates
documentation.description: List, create, update and get template content

documentation.title: List all templates
documentation.description: Result isn't paginated, amount of returned templates depenends on provider.

value.value: Hi there, this is text content of example email.

<!doctype html>
<html>

<head>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width">
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
  <title>Templated email example</title>
</head>

<body class="">
Hi there, this is html content of example email.
</body>

</html>
